verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney [V: has] indicated to family and friends he is willing to cooperate with federal investigators to alleviate pressure , according to a source familiar with the matter .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney] has [V: indicated] [ARG2: to family and friends] [ARG1: he is willing to cooperate with federal investigators to alleviate pressure] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a source familiar with the matter] .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney has indicated to family and friends [ARG1: he] [V: is] [ARG2: willing to cooperate with federal investigators to alleviate pressure] , according to a source familiar with the matter .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney has indicated to family and friends [ARG0: he] is willing to [V: cooperate] [ARG1: with federal investigators] [ARGM-PRP: to alleviate pressure] , according to a source familiar with the matter .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney has indicated to family and friends [ARG0: he] is willing to cooperate with federal investigators to [V: alleviate] [ARG1: pressure] , according to a source familiar with the matter .

President Donald Trump 's personal attorney has indicated to family and friends he is willing to cooperate with federal investigators to alleviate pressure , [V: according] to a source familiar with the matter .
